name: cifdata
description: Subset of the standard CIF tags for description a crystal structure.  Note that the initial underscore in tag names are omitted.

properties.name: symmetry_Int_Tables_number
properties.description: Space-group number from International Tables for Crystallography Vol. A (2002).

properties.name: cell_length_a
properties.description: Length of unit cell vector along the a-direction.

properties.name: cell_length_b
properties.description: Length of unit cell vector along the b-direction.

properties.name: cell_length_c
properties.description: Length of unit cell vector along the c-direction.

properties.name: cell_angle_alpha
properties.description: Angle between unit cell vectors b and c.

properties.name: cell_angle_beta
properties.description: Angle between unit cell vectors c and a.

properties.name: cell_angle_gamma
properties.description: Angle between unit cell vectors a and b.

properties.name: atom_site_label
properties.description: Unique identifiers for the crystal sites.  Typically this will be the chemical symbol of the atom occupying this site, optionally followed by an number (e.g. 'Cu1'), an underscore (e.g. 'Zn_Zn_301_A_O') or an asterix (e.g. H*251). Other labels are possible, but not considered here.

properties.name: atom_site_type_symbol
properties.description: Codes to identify the atom species (singular or plural) occupying this site. Typically the chemical symbol of the atom species (e.g. 'Ni').

properties.name: atom_site_symmetry_multiplicity
properties.description: The number of different sites that are generated by the application of the space-group symmetry to the coordinates given for the sites. These are equal to the multiplicities given for the Wyckoff sites in International Tables for Crystallography Vol. A (2002).  A zero indicates unknown multiplicity.

properties.name: atom_site_Wyckoff_symbol
properties.description: The Wyckoff symbol (letter) as listed in the space-group tables of International Tables for Crystallography Vol. A (2002).  '?' indicates unknown Wyckoff symbol.

properties.name: atom_site_fract_x
properties.description: Atom-site coordinates as fractions of the cell_length_ values.

properties.name: atom_site_fract_y
properties.description: Atom-site coordinates as fractions of the cell_length_ values.

properties.name: atom_site_fract_z
properties.description: Atom-site coordinates as fractions of the cell_length_ values.

properties.name: atom_site_occupancy
properties.description: The fraction of the atom type present at this site. The sum of the occupancies of all the atom types at this site may not exceed 1.0.
